mapper.sql: ID, GEN_DT, MER_NO, MER_NAME, FMRCH_NO, FMR_NAME, STL_DATE, START_STL_DATE, END_STL_DATE, SCENE, CONSUM_NUM, round(CONSUM_AMT,2) as CONSUM_AMT,round(TRAN_AMT,2) as TRAN_AMT ,round(NET_AMT,2) as NET_AMT , round(FEE,2) as FEE , FEE_ORDER, FEESTL_TYPE, STATUS, ACC_NO, ACC_NAME, BANK_NAME, BANK_CODE, BRANCH_NAME, UNION_NO, BEIJING_FLAG, IS_CONSUMP_CATEGORY, AMT_CONSUMP_CATEGORY, GROUP_FLAG, FINAL_STL_ID, FINAL_STL_FLAG, COMMENTS,MERCHANT_EMAIL, IS_SEND_BILLDETAIL, PDF_FLAG, SEND_EMAIL_TIMES, SEND_EMAIL_DATE
mapper.select:
select
example.distinct
from T_CLEAR_MERSTL_BOOK a
order by ${example.orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into T_CLEAR_MERSTL_BOOK (ID, GEN_DT, MER_NO, MER_NAME, FMRCH_NO, FMR_NAME, STL_DATE, START_STL_DATE, END_STL_DATE, SCENE, CONSUM_NUM, CONSUM_AMT, TRAN_AMT, NET_AMT, FEE, FEE_ORDER, FEESTL_TYPE, STATUS, ACC_NO, ACC_NAME, BANK_NAME, BANK_CODE, BRANCH_NAME, UNION_NO, BEIJING_FLAG, IS_CONSUMP_CATEGORY, AMT_CONSUMP_CATEGORY, GROUP_FLAG, FINAL_STL_ID, FINAL_STL_FLAG, COMMENTS) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{genDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fmrchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fmrName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stlDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startStlDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endStlDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scene,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{consumNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{consumAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tranAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{netAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{feeOrder,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{feestlType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{branchName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unionNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{beijingFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isConsumpCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amtConsumpCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{finalStlId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{finalStlFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comments,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update T_CLEAR_MERSTL_BOOK
ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GEN_DT = #{record.genDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MER_NO = #{record.merNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MER_NAME = #{record.merName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FMRCH_NO = #{record.fmrchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FMR_NAME = #{record.fmrName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STL_DATE = #{record.stlDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
START_STL_DATE = #{record.startStlDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
END_STL_DATE = #{record.endStlDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCENE = #{record.scene,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONSUM_NUM = #{record.consumNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CONSUM_AMT = #{record.consumAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TRAN_AMT = #{record.tranAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
NET_AMT = #{record.netAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FEE = #{record.fee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FEE_ORDER = #{record.feeOrder,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FEESTL_TYPE = #{record.feestlType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{record.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACC_NO = #{record.accNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACC_NAME = #{record.accName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BANK_NAME = #{record.bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BANK_CODE = #{record.bankCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BRANCH_NAME = #{record.branchName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UNION_NO = #{record.unionNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BEIJING_FLAG = #{record.beijingFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_CONSUMP_CATEGORY = #{record.isConsumpCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AMT_CONSUMP_CATEGORY = #{record.amtConsumpCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GROUP_FLAG = #{record.groupFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FINAL_STL_ID = #{record.finalStlId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FINAL_STL_FLAG = #{record.finalStlFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMMENTS = #{record.comments,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update T_CLEAR_MERSTL_BOOK set ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GEN_DT = #{record.genDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MER_NO = #{record.merNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MER_NAME = #{record.merName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FMRCH_NO = #{record.fmrchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FMR_NAME = #{record.fmrName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STL_DATE = #{record.stlDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, START_STL_DATE = #{record.startStlDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, END_STL_DATE = #{record.endStlDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SCENE = #{record.scene,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONSUM_NUM = #{record.consumNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CONSUM_AMT = #{record.consumAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TRAN_AMT = #{record.tranAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NET_AMT = #{record.netAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FEE = #{record.fee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FEE_ORDER = #{record.feeOrder,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FEESTL_TYPE = #{record.feestlType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{record.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACC_NO = #{record.accNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACC_NAME = #{record.accName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BANK_NAME = #{record.bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BANK_CODE = #{record.bankCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BRANCH_NAME = #{record.branchName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UNION_NO = #{record.unionNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BEIJING_FLAG = #{record.beijingFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_CONSUMP_CATEGORY = #{record.isConsumpCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AMT_CONSUMP_CATEGORY = #{record.amtConsumpCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GROUP_FLAG = #{record.groupFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FINAL_STL_ID = #{record.finalStlId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FINAL_STL_FLAG = #{record.finalStlFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMMENTS = #{record.comments,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_CLEAR_MERSTL_BOOK
GEN_DT = #{genDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MER_NO = #{merNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MER_NAME = #{merName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FMRCH_NO = #{fmrchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FMR_NAME = #{fmrName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STL_DATE = #{stlDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
START_STL_DATE = #{startStlDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
END_STL_DATE = #{endStlDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCENE = #{scene,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONSUM_NUM = #{consumNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CONSUM_AMT = #{consumAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TRAN_AMT = #{tranAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
NET_AMT = #{netAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FEE = #{fee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FEE_ORDER = #{feeOrder,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FEESTL_TYPE = #{feestlType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACC_NO = #{accNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACC_NAME = #{accName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BANK_NAME = #{bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BANK_CODE = #{bankCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BRANCH_NAME = #{branchName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UNION_NO = #{unionNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BEIJING_FLAG = #{beijingFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_CONSUMP_CATEGORY = #{isConsumpCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AMT_CONSUMP_CATEGORY = #{amtConsumpCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GROUP_FLAG = #{groupFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FINAL_STL_ID = #{finalStlId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FINAL_STL_FLAG = #{finalStlFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMMENTS = #{comments,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_CLEAR_MERSTL_BOOK set GEN_DT = #{genDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MER_NO = #{merNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MER_NAME = #{merName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FMRCH_NO = #{fmrchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FMR_NAME = #{fmrName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STL_DATE = #{stlDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, START_STL_DATE = #{startStlDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, END_STL_DATE = #{endStlDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SCENE = #{scene,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONSUM_NUM = #{consumNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CONSUM_AMT = #{consumAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TRAN_AMT = #{tranAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NET_AMT = #{netAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FEE = #{fee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FEE_ORDER = #{feeOrder,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FEESTL_TYPE = #{feestlType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACC_NO = #{accNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACC_NAME = #{accName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BANK_NAME = #{bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BANK_CODE = #{bankCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BRANCH_NAME = #{branchName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UNION_NO = #{unionNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BEIJING_FLAG = #{beijingFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_CONSUMP_CATEGORY = #{isConsumpCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AMT_CONSUMP_CATEGORY = #{amtConsumpCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GROUP_FLAG = #{groupFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FINAL_STL_ID = #{finalStlId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FINAL_STL_FLAG = #{finalStlFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMMENTS = #{comments,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select sum(consum_num) || '#' ||to_char(sum(consum_amt),'fm999999999999990.90')|| '#' ||to_char(sum(tran_amt),'fm999999999999990.90')|| '#' || to_char(sum(net_amt),'fm999999999999990.90')|| '#' || to_char(sum(fee),'fm999999999999990.90') as fee from T_CLEAR_MERSTL_BOOK a

select a.id, a.gen_dt, a.mer_no, a.mer_name, a.fmrch_no, a.fmr_name, a.stl_date, a.start_stl_date, a.end_stl_date, a.scene, a.consum_num, a.consum_amt, a.tran_amt, a.net_amt, a.fee, a.fee_order, a.feestl_type, a.status, a.acc_no, a.acc_name, a.bank_name, a.bank_code, a.branch_name, a.union_no, a.beijing_flag, a.is_consump_category, a.amt_consump_category, a.group_flag, a.final_stl_id, a.final_stl_flag, a.comments, b.payout_date, b.seq_no, b.comments as final_comments from t_clear_merstl_book a left join t_clear_merstl_final_book b on a.final_stl_id = b.id
order by a.FINAL_STL_ID DESC,a.MER_NO DESC, a.GEN_DT DESC

select sum(consum_num) || '#' ||to_char(sum(consum_amt),'fm999999999999990.90')|| '#' ||to_char(sum(tran_amt),'fm999999999999990.90')|| '#' || to_char(sum(net_amt),'fm999999999999990.90')|| '#' || to_char(sum(fee),'fm999999999999990.90') as fee from T_CLEAR_MERSTL_BOOK_T a

select a.id, a.gen_dt, a.mer_no, a.mer_name, a.fmrch_no, a.fmr_name, a.stl_date, a.start_stl_date, a.end_stl_date, a.scene, a.consum_num, a.consum_amt, a.tran_amt, a.net_amt, a.fee, a.fee_order, a.feestl_type, a.status, a.acc_no, a.acc_name, a.bank_name, a.bank_code, a.branch_name, a.union_no, a.beijing_flag, a.is_consump_category, a.amt_consump_category, a.group_flag, a.final_stl_id, a.final_stl_flag, a.comments, b.payout_date, b.seq_no, b.comments as final_comments from T_CLEAR_MERSTL_BOOK_T a left join T_CLEAR_MERSTL_FINAL_BOOK_T b on a.final_stl_id = b.id
order by a.FINAL_STL_ID DESC,a.MER_NO DESC, a.GEN_DT DESC
mapper.update:
UPDATE T_CLEAR_MERSTL_BOOK
ID = #{id},
PDF_FLAG = #{pdfFlag},
SEND_EMAIL_TIMES = #{sendEmailTimes},
SEND_EMAIL_DATE = #{sendEmailDate},
AND STL_DATE = #{stlDate}
AND MER_NO = #{merNo}
